TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqliteFunctionEx extends Mono.Data.Sqlite.SqliteFunction

Docs.summary: Extends SqliteFunction and allows an inherited class to obtain the collating sequence associated with a function call.
Docs.remarks: User-defined functions can call the GetCollationSequence() method in this class and use it to compare strings and char arrays.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method familyhidebysig instance valuetype Mono.Data.Sqlite.CollationSequence GetCollationSequence() cil managed

Docs.summary: Obtains the collating sequence in effect for the given function.
